#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define x first
#define y second
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const int SIZE = 1e4+1;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
ll n,k;
int x,y;
int totWt;
ll *a;

inline ll scan()
{
    ll x=0;
    register char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9') c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return(x);
}


inline void write(ll x)
{
    int i=0;
    char s[25];
    do{
        s[i++]=x%10+'0';
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    --i;
    while(i>=0) putchar_unlocked(s[i--]);
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
    }


int main()
{
     long long t,n,avg=0,sum=0,i,k,surplus=0,temp;
     t=scan();
     while(t--){
         n=scan();
         k=scan();
          avg=k;
          sum=k;
          surplus=0;
          for(i=1;i<n;i++){
               k=scan();
               if(k<avg){
                    if(k+surplus>=avg){surplus-=(avg-k);}
                    else{temp=surplus;surplus=((avg*i)+k+surplus)%(i+1);avg=((avg*i)+k+temp)/(i+1);}}
               else
                   surplus+=(k-avg);}
          write(avg);}
     return 0;}
